item.title: Genetic algorithm
item.description: Genetic algorithm is a heuristic that takes heavy inspiration from evolutionary biology, to explore a space of parameters rapidly and converge to an optimum. Every solution is a “genome”, and the combinations can undergo mutation and recombination. By simulating a process of reproduction, over sufficiently many generation, this heuristic usually gives very good results. It is also simple to implement, and this is what we will do!
